Title: N'est pas confortable
Content: N'est pas confortable et très étroit
Brand Response: Bonjour Faten,  Merci d'avoir partagé votre avis concernant le confort et la taille du produit que vous avez acheté.  Nous comprenons que la taille peut parfois être une préoccupation majeure lors d'un achat. C'est pourquoi vous devez essayer soigneusement les chaussures avant de les acheter.  Cependant, avec Decathlon, vous n'avez pas à vous inquiéter, et si vos chaussures sont encore neuves, vous pouvez revenir pour les remplacer.  Vous êtes toujours la bienvenue.  Bonne journée.  sportivement Marwen

Title: Not Satisfied
Content: Not exactly as shown in the image
Brand Response: Hello Rana, Thank you for your feedback regarding the women's running shoes. We're sorry to hear that the product did not meet your expectations.  We understand how important it is for our customers to receive a product that matches what they see in the image. To help us better understand the issue, could you kindly provide more details about what was different or what aspect of the shoes did not meet your expectations? Whether it's the color, design, fit, or any other feature, your insights will be very helpful.  Your feedback is valuable to us, and we will be sure to review it with our team to ensure that we improve the accuracy of our product images and descriptions. We always strive to offer the best experience for our customers.  Thank you again for bringing this to our attention. We look forward to hearing from you and making sure your concerns are addressed  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Title: It's Not A Comfortable Size Is Very Small
Content: Not good
Brand Response: Hello Kollurkar, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear that the women’s running shoes felt uncomfortable and that the size was smaller than expected. We understand how important the right fit is, especially when it comes to footwear for running or active use.  To better understand the issue, could you please confirm if the size you ordered is the one you usually wear, or if this particular model felt tighter than expected? This will help us review any potential sizing inconsistencies.  We truly appreciate your input and are here to assist you further if needed. Your experience matters to us, and your feedback helps us improve our products.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to address this, and I look forward to hearing from you.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Title: Kalenji futócipő
Content: Abszolút kezdő futóként vettem ezt a cipőt, aszfaltra. Olvastam olyan véleményt, hogy volt akinek rövid idő után megfájdult benne a talpa, én ezt egyáltalán nem tapasztaltam, nekem kényelmes. Hetente 2-3 alkalommal használom, az ütéscsillapítása mérsékelt, de ettől a modelltől nem is vártam többet. Könnyű, jól gördül, a cipőfűzője lehetne kicsit hosszabb.

Title: No Title
Content: Scarpe ottime per camminare su strada, leggere, comode.. quasi come non averle ai piedi. Vestono leggermente piccole.
Brand Response: Gentile Nadia, grazie per il tempo dedicatoci nel recensire le Scarpe running donna JOGFLOW 500.1 nere. Siamo felicissimi di ricevere recensioni come queste e venire a conoscenza che il prodotto da lei acquistato abbia soddisfatto appieno le sue aspettative. Le confermiamo che questo articolo viene solitamente consigliato a chi pratica camminata o corsa per la leggerezza, la traspirabilità e anche per l'ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo. Recensioni positive come questa ci spingono ogni giorno a proporre prodotti innovativi e sempre più qualitativi. Con l'augurio di ricevere altre sue recensioni per aiutarci a sviluppare i nostri prodotti sportivi, le auguriamo buona serata. Massimo Referente Running Italia

Title: Feels like a duplicate product of decathlon.
Content: For the first time felt like decathlon did a scam to me. Shoe came with no boxes even when you scan the product it doesn't shoe anything with it. Front side of one pair stich with glue. Its really a terrible experience. very disappointed. Even the in hand feel is terrible.
Brand Response: Hello Smitarini, Thank you for sharing your experience, and I’m really sorry to hear that you’re dissatisfied with the shoes. We completely understand how frustrating it can be when a product doesn’t meet your expectations, especially when you feel it’s not up to the quality you expect.  We take product quality very seriously, and we regret that your pair arrived with issues like the lack of a box and glue-stitching on the front. This is definitely not the experience we want for our customers. Regarding the warranty, please note that it covers the sole pasting, but wear and tear due to usage, especially on the front toe stitching, would unfortunately fall outside of this coverage.  That said, we definitely want to make sure you’re satisfied, so if there’s a defect or something specific that’s bothering you, we’d love to look into it and help resolve the issue. If the product doesn’t meet the standards you expect, please let us know, and we can discuss potential options.  Again, we’re really sorry for the trouble this has caused, and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to address it. Please don’t hesitate to reach out directly.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Nous prenons en compte toutes les suggestions de nos clients, et l'idée d'augmenter la hauteur de la semelle de 3 mm est intéressante. Nous transmettrons cette suggestion à notre équipe produit pour examen. Si vous avez d'autres idées ou commentaires, n'hésitez pas à nous les partager ! Douaa-L'équipe Décathlon

Title: Chaussure running très satisfaisante pour débutant
Content: Elles sont légères, confortables et bien amorties, ce qui est parfait pour une reprise en douceur ou pour des sorties tranquilles. Le design est sympa, féminin sans en faire trop, et la couleur rose corail donne un petit coup de pep’s.  Elles maintiennent bien le pied sans être trop rigides, et je n’ai eu aucune douleur ni ampoule même dès la première utilisation.  Excellent rapport qualité-prix, je recommande pour les débutantes ou pour une utilisation loisir !

Title: Not Upto Mark
Content: I got pain in foot after using this shoe. It's not comfortable at all.
Brand Response: Hello S, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We’re truly sorry to hear that the women’s running shoes caused discomfort and pain in your foot. That’s certainly not what we want anyone to go through, especially with footwear meant to support your movement.  To better understand what may have caused the issue, could you share a bit more about how the shoes felt while in use? For example, was it related to the arch, heel, or overall fit? Also, knowing how long you wore them and for what activity could help us assess the concern more clearly.  We aim to create running shoes that provide comfort, support, and performance, so feedback like yours is incredibly important in helping us improve. Every experience matters, and we're always working to better understand where things can be improved.  Thanks again for getting in touch. We appreciate your honesty and are here if you'd like to share any more details with us.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United
